mapper.insert: insert into attraction(place_name, place_address, place_content, place_category, place_img) values (#{place_name},#{place_address},#{place_content},#{place_category},#{place_img})
insert into home(home_name, home_address, home_content, home_local, home_type, home_img) values (#{home_name},#{home_address},#{home_content},#{home_local},#{home_type},#{home_img})
